value:
You'd do well to keep your distance.
Who would want to associate with
this pitiful, cursed existence?

The lights of this castle are as bright
as its occupants are lively. I can't say
this place suits me well.

Could there really be others in this
world who share my burden?

I can cook well enough—I am an
adult, after all.$k$pHmm... You don't believe me, do
you? I can tell by the look on your
face.

You want to be friends, hm? Well,
know this: I don't intend to waste
time on pleasantries.

Ugh, I can't bear this place
much longer. Can I go back to
$Nf's castle yet?

This may be impressive now, but in
the end, nothing will have changed.
That is how I must atone for my sins.

To grow and to change as you head
toward your final days is not a gift
that should be squandered.

No matter how much I grow, this
cursed form remains the same—
an eternal reminder of my crimes.

You think this is a good fit for me?
If you say so...

My name is Nyx. Let me be frank: I'm
best left alone. Not you nor anyone
else can understand my plight.

Yes? Can I help you?$k$pI hope you know you're intruding on
my alone time. Though... I guess an
interruption now and then is fine.$k$pThis place is peaceful... Almost too
peaceful for someone with so much
blood on their hands.$k$pI never thought I'd work side by side
with people again... Until I was
summoned here, that is.$k$pWhat do you think? Will you be the
one to give me a second chance,
$Nu?
はあっ
甘いわ
くっ…
小癪な…
Crimes are meant to be punished.
There is no escaping fate.
Do not underestimate me.
You've made a grave mistake.
Guess I...had it coming...
ふう…
My name is Nyx, and I will thank you to not treat me like a child.
*startled noise* Oh, it's you. Think twice before teasing your elders like that.
Cutting all ties with people will help me atone for my past. It must...
I'm quite the bookworm, so permit me to ask: what do people in Askr like to read?
I took countless lives in my foolish youth. For that, I was cursed with this unaging body...
My true body is surely much taller and more mature than this one...but what of my hair?
Summoning me was a bad omen...but worry not. I'll make it up to you.
Very well.
Indeed?
Another day, another sin.
